ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] More on SoV
ygData.msgSnippet: I run a software etc and we carry the full version which includes kunark (which is really cheap now) and then the new exp seperately. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I run a software etc and we carry the full version which includes kunark
(which is really cheap now) and then the new exp seperately.


----- Original Message -----
From: <JESSICA_WEBBER@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 05, 2000 1:46 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] More on SoV


>
> Silly question, but are stores selling just the expansions, a full EQ
> including Kunark & Velious, or both?
>
>
>
>
> "Mott, Mike J."
> <mike.j.mott@usa.c To:
> onoco.com> "'eqbards@egroups.com'"
> <eqbards@egroups.com>
> 12/05/2000 01:41 cc:
> PM Subject: RE: [eqbards]
> Please respond to More on SoV
> eqbards
>
>
>
>
>
>
> Well I got my copies of Velious today from EBWorld, and I went home at
> lunch
> and installed them. Be ready for about a 6.5mb Scars patch on top of the
> patch everyone else is receiving.
>
> I am definitely looking forward to getting home this afternoon, exploring
> new zones and looking for new songs!
>
> Lago Bardoon of Bertox
> 52 Minstrel
> Guild Leader, Defenders of Aleria
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
